languages.text: "Твои цвета, и без того пронзительные, словно сошли с ума... Разве ты не боялась, что буря в сердце способна поглотить тебя без остатка?"
"Your colours were already piercing, but now they seem to have gone crazy... Are you not afraid that the storm in your heart might devour you whole?"
languages.original_text: "Твои цвета, и без того пронзительные, словно сошли с ума... Разве ты не боялась, что буря в сердце способна поглотить тебя без остатка?"

traits.locale_text: "Your colours were already piercing, but now they seem to have gone crazy... Are you not afraid that the storm in your heart might devour you whole?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你的色彩原本就很刺眼，但现在却似乎变得更加错乱难辨了……难道你就不怕，你心中的风暴会将你整个吞没吗？”
languages.original_text: "Your colours were already piercing, but now they seem to have gone crazy... Are you not afraid that the storm in your heart might devour you whole?"

traits.locale_text: “你的色彩原本就很刺眼，但现在却似乎变得更加错乱难辨了……难道你就不怕，你心中的风暴会将你整个吞没吗？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vos couleurs ont toujours été très vives, mais là, c'est comme si elles s'affolaient... Ne craignez-vous pas que les remous de votre cœur finissent par vous consumer ? »
languages.original_text: "Your colours were already piercing, but now they seem to have gone crazy... Are you not afraid that the storm in your heart might devour you whole?"

traits.locale_text: « Vos couleurs ont toujours été très vives, mais là, c'est comme si elles s'affolaient... Ne craignez-vous pas que les remous de votre cœur finissent par vous consumer ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Tus colores ya eran penetrantes, pero ahora parecen estar descontrolados... ¿No te preocupa que te devore la tormenta de tu corazón?».
languages.original_text: "Your colours were already piercing, but now they seem to have gone crazy... Are you not afraid that the storm in your heart might devour you whole?"

traits.locale_text: «Tus colores ya eran penetrantes, pero ahora parecen estar descontrolados... ¿No te preocupa que te devore la tormenta de tu corazón?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの色は前々から見えていました、しかし今では乱れに乱れています…その心の嵐があなたの一切を飲み込むのではないかと、恐れているのではないですか？」
languages.original_text: "Your colours were already piercing, but now they seem to have gone crazy... Are you not afraid that the storm in your heart might devour you whole?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの色は前々から見えていました、しかし今では乱れに乱れています…その心の嵐があなたの一切を飲み込むのではないかと、恐れているのではないですか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Farben waren bereits stechend, doch nun spielen sie vollends verrückt ... Habt Ihr denn keine Angst, dass der Sturm in Eurem Herzen Euch lebendig verschlingen könnte?"
languages.original_text: "Your colours were already piercing, but now they seem to have gone crazy... Are you not afraid that the storm in your heart might devour you whole?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Farben waren bereits stechend, doch nun spielen sie vollends verrückt ... Habt Ihr denn keine Angst, dass der Sturm in Eurem Herzen Euch lebendig verschlingen könnte?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Your colours were already piercing, but now they seem to have gone crazy... Are you not afraid that the storm in your heart might devour you whole?"

languages.text: "Renklerin zaten yürekleri deliyordu, şimdiyse çıldırmış gibiler. Kalbindeki fırtınanın seni canlı canlı yiyip bitirmesinden korkmuyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "Your colours were already piercing, but now they seem to have gone crazy... Are you not afraid that the storm in your heart might devour you whole?"

traits.locale_text: "Renklerin yürekleri deliyordu ama artık çıldırmış gibiler. Kalbindeki fırtınanın seni canlı canlı yiyip bitirmesinden korkmuyor musun?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
